mapper.select: SELECT `id`, `staff_id`, `commodity_id`, `section_id`, `station_id`, `sub_id`, `conversion_time`, `active`,s.staff_name as staff_name,b.commodity_name as commodity_name,l.station_name as station_name,w.subcontractors_name as sub_name FROM `smart_site`.`conversion` a INNER `smart_site`.`staff` s ON a.`staff_id`=s.`id` INNER `smart_site`.`commodity` b ON a.`staff_id`=b.`id` INNER `smart_site`.`station` l ON a.`staff_id`=l.`id` INNER `smart_site`.`subcontractors` w ON a.`staff_id`=w.`id` WHERE a.`section_id`=#{section_id} limit #{page},#{pageSize}

SELECT `id`, `staff_id`, `commodity_id`, `section_id`, `station_id`, `sub_id`, `conversion_time`, `active`,s.staff_name as staff_name,b.commodity_name as commodity_name,l.station_name as station_name,w.subcontractors_name as sub_name FROM `smart_site`.`conversion` a INNER `smart_site`.`staff` s ON a.`staff_id`=s.`id` INNER `smart_site`.`commodity` b ON a.`staff_id`=b.`id` INNER `smart_site`.`station` l ON a.`staff_id`=l.`id` INNER `smart_site`.`subcontractors` w ON a.`staff_id`=w.`id` WHERE a.`section_id`=#{section_id} and a.`staff_id`=#{staff_id} limit #{page},#{pageSize}
